115331.content: Zack and Cody become conjoined twins. Their two heads share a normal body. Zack controls one side, and Cody the other side.
115331.title: Conjoined

choices: Only one of the twins wake up
Both of the twins wake up
1153311.content:
Zack and Cody walked down into Arwin's workshop. "Hey Arwin!" they greeted him.

"Hey Guys!" Arwin exclaimed. "You guys are just in time to see the unveiling of my GREATEST INVENTION EVER!!!"

The twins gave each other a nervous glance. None of Arwin's inventions ever turned out well. Something always went wrong. "Uh...Arwin" Cody began.

"Oh, don't worry you guys; this machine is sure to work perfectly. I have taken all...well almost all the kinks out of it." Arwin smiled.

Zack repeated, "Almost?" Him and Cody shared another nervous glance.

Oblivious, Arwin continued, "Here it is." He grabbed the plastic sheet that was obviously covering his newest invention. It looked like a giant ray gun, that happened to be pointing at them. Zack and Cody anxiously moved out of its line of sight. "Behold My Teleportation Ray! Like its name suggests, this baby can transport anything from one location to another. Though, I haven't quite figured out how to bring them back...but thats not so important right now."

Now safely away from the end of the ray, Cody began to examine it more closely. He was impressed, he believed it actually could beam someone. "Wow Arwin. How does it work?"

"Oh...I am glad you asked Cody. The Teleporter will blast you with Arwin energy, my own discovery. The energy will zip you through space-time to the desired location." Arwin happily explained.

"Uh...How does it do that?" Cody looked at Arwin confused.

Arwin rubbed his head, like he really didn't know, and then quickly said, "I know, you guys would probably like a demonstration."

"Yeah!" Zack cheered.

Arwin set an empty can of soda, right where the ray would hit. He then handed each of the twins a pair of giant metal helmets. He explained that normal goggles would not block the bright light safely. "Alright, THREE...TWO...ONE!" Arwin pressed the trigger. The Teleporter powered up, emitting a sharp sound. And then, something broke off on the machine. Some weird light escaped, and bombarded Zack and Cody.

It was incredibly painful. It felt like their bodies were being taken apart. They tried to scream, but nothing came out. In what seemed like forever, the pain began to subside. Their bodies felt like they were coming back together.
1153311.title: The Accident

11533112.content:
Zack moaned as he opened his eyes. Cody also woke. Arwin was standing over them with a shocked expression. "Uh...Are you two...alright?" Arwin asked nervously.

"Yeah" Zack and Cody said together. It was their programed response.

They tried to sit up, but Arwin pushed them back down. "You guys don't want to sit up just yet."

"Why?" was all Zack could say. He said in his head, "Is there something I don't want to find out?" Zack focused onto Arwin. "What did that thing do? I kind of lied, I do feel...funny. My whole left side feels missing."

Cody complained, "Yeah, I can't feel my right side." Again they tried to sit up, but Arwin forced them down. Since Arwin wasn't letting them up, instinctively, the twins their turned heads toward one another, but they only managed to slam their heads together. "Zack! Why is your head so close to mine!"

"What!? Your head is too close?" Zack insisted. Each tried to pulling in the opposite direction, but neither was able to move far. The only thing that happened was a stretching feeling along their chest. Zack whimpered, "Arwin! What did that thing do?!"

Arwin finally let them sit up, and brought a mirror forward so they could see their new body. From the shoulders down, they looked normal; their shoulders just looked slightly broader than the usual. From the shoulder's up however, Zack and Cody's heads were crowded together on top of them. Their heads were so close that they could not look directly at each other, unless they looked through a mirror. Also, they figured out very quickly that they could only control the side of the body where their head was over. Basically, Zack could only feel and control the right, and Cody the left.
11533112.title: The Wake Up Conjoined

1233.content:
There was a Science Fair happening on the ship. Each student was required to bring in something them made. London stopped by the class room to drop off her project, a literal money tree (which is just money taped to a tree). She gets to the classroom, and puts her tree down. As she was leaving, she spots another project, a machine with two helmets attached to it. The machine was shiny so that instantly attracted London to it.

"Oh! Shiny!" she says as she puts one of the helmets on

Someone sees her do this, who is it?
1233.title: Body Swap

123311.content:
While London is trying on the helmet, Bailey comes out of the storage room

"What the... London??"

"Oh! Hi Bailey! What do you think of my hat?" she says fidgeting with it

"What? No! London, this is my science project"

"Well you should have come to me. These hats could use some jewels. Fortunately, I have some with me!" see says as she take some out of her purse and starts putting them on the other helmet

"No London. This is my science project. It's---" she is interrupted by London putting the other helmet on Bailey

"There! Don't those gems look nice?" London says, feeling accomplishing. Putting her arm against the machine, which starts activating

"No London! You hit the ON Butto--" Bailey said trying to get her helmet off in time, but it was too late
123311.title: Bailey

info.brief_description: You've seen the shows now see or should that be sea them all change
info.description:
You have seen the shows now watch the characters change.

Any tf is allowed except animal, weight gain or object change apart from that they can tf anything.

here is the plot line, for some unexplained reason (you can explain it later if you want) one member of the cast from one of the shows TF in some way or a other and they now have to find away out of this adventure

Rules:
no sex
no nudity
no drug use or referance
no swearing (I will except beep and !%*&("$)
don't end the story quickly
no insulting any religon
no sexis or racism
no toilet stuff
no killing characters
and do not go over my limits.
